prompt.purpose: Provide ready-to-copy prompt templates for common project documentation.
prompt.context: Use these prompts to create standard deliverables without starting from a blank page.
prompt.instructions: Copy the relevant prompt below and replace the placeholders with your project details.
prompt.inputs: Variables such as `{{Project Name}}`, `{{Feature Area}}`, and similar placeholders appear in the subprompts.
prompt.additional_notes:
Prompts marked with * may result in multi-page outputs.

---
